title: #1592 Weaponized Gypsy Ladies
itunes:title: #1592 Weaponized Gypsy Ladies
description:
Adam and Drew open the show with Adam fired up over the state of his coffee mug and the overall state of dishwashing etiquette in America that has led to him be regarded as 'gross' by many, if not all around him. They also discuss people's ignorance when it comes to the cars they drive with both Adam & Dr. Drew sharing personal examples from the very recent past. They also speak with a caller who is concerned that his wife is being prescribed SSRI medication for a bowel issue and is worried about the side effects. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
